title: A qualitative comparison between critical care sites which use a computerised information system and conventional data management.

abstract: The final instalment of the work derived from my PhD project compares a set of open ended questions used at  a site which use a computerised data management system and compares it with two which use conventional charting. This produces theoretical constructs to explain how nurses use these systems and suggestions for their developmen

A qualitative comparison between critical care sites which use a computerised information system and conventional data management.</dc:title><dc:creator>
Norrie, Peter</dc:creator><dc:description>
The final instalment of the work derived from my PhD project compares a set of open ended questions used at  a site which use a computerised data management system and compares it with two which use conventional charting. This produces theoretical constructs to explain how nurses use these systems and suggestions for their development</dc:description><dc:date>
